response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to us both. This product is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I understand its significance. After careful consideration, I am extending a special offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you for $1,150,000. This price reflects a fair valuation while allowing us to share the benefits of this exceptional item. I believe this offer presents a unique chance for us to collaborate and achieve mutual satisfaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1150000}
